sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ADTFixScriptExecutor</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Takes the execution log record and pulls the associated script files and execute them.</description>
        <name>ADTFixScriptExecutor</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ADTFixScriptExecutor = Class.create();
ADTFixScriptExecutor.prototype = Object.extendsObject(ADTBaseExecutor, {

    iterateScriptMappingsAndExecute: function() {
		ADTLogger.log("Executing fix script of record with sys_id: " + this.context.failedScriptSysID);
		var scriptFetcher = ADTCRUDHelper.fetchSingleRecordWithSysID(ADTConstants.SCRIPT_TABLE, this.context.failedScriptSysID);
        this.executeScript(scriptFetcher);
    },

	getScriptColumnName: function() {
		return ADTConstants.SCRIPT_COL_FIX_SCRIPT;
	},

    getGlobalContextName: function() {
        return ADTConstants.FIX_CONTEXT;
    },
	
	prepareAndHoldFailureUIResult: function(scriptFetcher, failureJSON) {
        var uiResult = {};
        uiResult[ADTConstants.UI_RESULT_STATUS] = ADTConstants.STATUS_FAILURE;
        uiResult[ADTConstants.UI_RESULT_SCRIPT_NAME] = scriptFetcher.getValue(ADTConstants.NAME);
		uiResult[ADTConstants.UI_RESULT_MESSAGE] = new ADTMessageProcessor(failureJSON.message).process();
        this.uiResults.push(uiResult);
    },


	handleFailure: function(scriptFetcher, scriptResult) {
		this.prevScriptExecutionState = ADTConstants.STATUS_FAILURE;
        this.prepareAndHoldFailureUIResult(scriptFetcher, scriptResult);
	},
	

    type: 'ADTFixScriptExecutor'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-08-16 15:49:03</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0ffd84b1b797330063e1c386ee11a931</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ADTFixScriptExecutor</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Application Diagnostics Tool" source="com.snc.app_diagnostics_tool">822052ab47e64210cd4e1ce4316d4382</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0ffd84b1b797330063e1c386ee11a931</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-09-24 19:40:10</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
